source: (SELECT l.legiscan_id, l.name, l.district, l.did, l.aid, l.pds_handle, p.name as party_name, r.name as role_name, s.state_abbr, s.state_name FROM legislators l LEFT JOIN partys p ON l.party_id = p.id LEFT JOIN roles r ON l.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN states s ON l.state_id = s.id WHERE l.pds_synced_at IS NULL OR l.pds_synced_at < l.updated_at) AS unsynced_legislators
